articles.content:

articles.title: Here’s the difference between POCO F3 GT and Redmi K40 GE - Gizchina.com

articles.content: Xiaomi decided that affordable gaming smartphones should hit the market and released the Redmi K40 Game Enhanced Edition in April. Later, it was reported that the smartphone will also enter the globa… [+2065 chars]
